import re
def text_book_adapter(raw_text, book_meta):
"""
ูุญููู ูุชุงุจูุง ูุตููุง ููุตูููุง ุจู (ุงูุตูุญุฉ X)
ุฅูู ุตูุญุงุช ูุนุฑููุฉ ููุญูุฏุฉ
"""
# ุชูุณูู ุงููุต ุญุณุจ ููุงุตู ุงูุตูุญุงุช
parts = re.split(r"ุงูุตูุญุฉ\s+(\d+)", raw_text)
pages = []
for i in range(1, len(parts), 2):
page_number = int(parts[i])
content = parts[i + 1].strip()
pages.append({
"book_id": book_meta["book_id"],
"book_title": book_meta["book_title"],
"part": book_meta.get("part"),
"author": book_meta.get("author"),
"page": page_number,
"content": content,
"source_type": "text",
"confidence": 0.98
})
return pages
